APP_HOME_INFO: Search COVID-19 test results and exposure risk using test barcode or location QR code. All information submitted in the portal is end-to-end encrypted.
APP_ABOUT_MOAI_INFO_P1: Moai is a smart, secure contact tracing solution created by Secretarium, a deep-tech startup founded in 2016 with the aim of building useful technology that never compromises anyoneâ€™s privacy. The founders are from the world of banking, but they left to pursue projects that would solve problems around handling highly sensitive data: enforcing consent and guaranteeing privacy by design and by default.
